Version 2.0.56 - Read+Write Interceptors for Resume Correction

Bug Fix

  • Fixes resume still loading at slide 13 instead of furthest (16) after page refresh
  • Root cause: backing store modification alone is insufficient - Storyline reads from its internal cmi object before our modification takes effect

Changes

  • Added read interceptors for resume correction: returns corrected suspend_data and lesson_location during Storyline init (up to 5 reads)
  • Added write interceptors for resume correction: forces furthest slide when Storyline writes back a lower position
  • Added scheduled post-init write to ensure DB has furthest slide after init settles
  • Expanded defineProperty traps to activate for resume correction (not just tag navigation)
  • All changes applied to both SCORM 1.2 and SCORM 2004

Previous Version

  • v2.0.55: Backing store correction on resume (insufficient alone)
